title: Speed Demon: Days of the Dead – Ft. Geses
description:
Join us for the debut of our new fast/evil party series Speed Demon, on the Days of the Dead with headliner Geses

### Headliner:

**► Geses**


[Linktr.ee/iamgeses](https://linktr.ee/iamgeses)


#1 USA dance radio producer-Geses is the perfect balance between old-school Techno, Trance, and modern festival energy. His unique sound called "Nu World Rave" brings a breath of fresh air on the American and world-wide scene. Over the last 2 years, Geses built an incredibly strong fan base as being one of the hottest remixers on SoundCloud. His remixes-originals gained him viral and international support from over 30 DJ Mag 100 acts, radio play, satellite radio play, shows and major fests across Canada and the USA, collaborations with a-lister DJs, #1 USA radio ghost productions, and even his first 6 figures major record deal with Sony Relentless. it's safe to say the future is looking bright for Geses.
